attributes.action: change the government's policy on car seat with 5 point harness for older children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many parents are frustrated that car seats with 5 point harnesses are not available here in the uk for older children.  uk parents would like a change in the law to have more choices when it comes to a seat with 5 points harness.  some of the other seats available here are for up to 4 years old but this needs debating as not all 4 year old are the same and some grew out of these seats by age 2.5 to 3 years old, then according to uk law, the cars 3 point seat belt should be used with a booster seat so obviously a child is less protected wearing a shoulder belt.  please change the law mr pm as the safety of our children should be paramount even when traveling! a simple 5 point car seat harness is all that’s required.
